channel.title: 508 Client need help
channel.description:
Basically I run my own server, but you need a certain client to run it. I was thinking of putting it on to a website, so i uploaded the files of the client and tried to run it that way, dont work.
How do i get it to work? like when you play runescape they have there own online client for it. Please Help
Thanks
Brad
